data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Describe the last time you were scared to try something new but did anyway. How did you get the courage to try it? What did you learn from this experience that will help you in life?
data.answer: I had never tried skiing before because I was too scared to do so, but I did it anyway last winter. My best friend, William, asked me if I would like to go skiing with him and a group of his friends. I didn't give him my response straightaway. Instead, I had a thorough thought over that plan for a couple of days because I had never skied before, and I hardly knew any of the other people in the group. Finally, I made my mind – I decided to join them and leave all the concerns behind. I suppose the biggest driver was my will to try playing extreme sports. If, for any reason, I had chosen otherwise, I suppose that I would regret so much. Because I experienced the great fun of skiing and viewed the amazingly gorgeous scenery of the snow mountain. Besides, I wouldn't have met so many amazing people who have taken good care of me and taught me how to ski. Apart from the skiing skill, I also learnt that I should step out of my comfort zone and try things that I haven't experienced before as I only live once. (197字)
